title: Stacked By Summer - Class Edition
desc: Summer is here and we're ready to stack! Join us for a fun-filled class where we'll be creating a beautiful stacked bracelet. This is a great project for beginners and experienced crafters alike. We'll be using a variety of beads and charms to create a unique and stylish bracelet. All materials will be provided, so you can just show up and have fun! We'll be meeting at the studio on Saturday, June 15th at 10:00 AM. Hope to see you there!
